If SHC-HWC is a delivery point: Administer the first dose of Magnesium Sulphate injection as per standard 
protocol. Immediately arrange to refer the woman to an FRU and ensure that she reaches the FRU as 
early as possible, preferably within two hours of receiving the first dose of Magnesium Sulphate injection.
